alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yalobusha and western Calhoun Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coffeeville, or 13 miles northeast of Grenada, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coffeeville, Slate Springs, Sabougla, Velma, Scobey, Oakland, Big Creek, Spearman, Bryant, Benwood, Bounds, Pine Valley, Ellard, Tillatoba, Shepherd, Skuna, Tyson, Gums, Retreat and Dentontown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
